newsitem.title: USA: Allstar Systems IPO pricing range cut.
newsitem.headline: Allstar Systems IPO pricing range cut.

text.p: The price to buy shares of Allstar Systems Inc in the company's initial public offering was cut to the $7-to- $8-a-share range, lead underwriter Sutro & Co said on Monday

The company had previously filed to sell shares for between $8 and $10 each. The deal is due to price later this evening for trading Tuesday on the Nasdaq under the symbol "ALLS". About 2.035 million shares will sold in the IPO.
The Houston company postponed an earlier plan to go public with underwriter Rauscher Pierce Refnes. Allstar provides computer and telecommunications hardware and software.
